title: 85/57/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 December 1984 approving an amendment to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of horticultural products in England and Wales, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 19 December 1984
approving an amendment to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of horticultural products in England and Wales, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the English text is authentic)
(85/57/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of horticultural products in England and Wales, forwarded by the Government of the United Kingdom on 16 October 1984 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 and on which additional information was provided on 16 November 1984, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 180, 7. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 185, 18. 7. 1980, p. 44.
